content.text: Match ends, Juventus 2, Malmö FF 0.
Second Half ends, Juventus 2, Malmö FF 0.
Offside, Juventus. Leonardo Bonucci tries a through ball, but Sebastian Giovinco is caught offside.
Foul by Sebastian Giovinco (Juventus).
Anton Tinnerholm (Malmö FF) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Juventus. Rômulo replaces Stephan Lichtsteiner.
Substitution, Juventus. Sebastian Giovinco replaces Carlos Tévez.
Goal!  Juventus 2, Malmö FF 0. Carlos Tévez (Juventus) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
